message: SQLSTATE[23000]: Integrity constraint violation: 19 NOT NULL constraint failed: _mysql_data_types_cache.mysql_type.
details:
[07-May-2025 03:45:57 UTC] WordPress database error
 

MySQL query:

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS wp_cur_typestates ( id bigint(20) unsigned auto_increment , type_id bigint(20) UNSIGNED NOT NULL, state_id bigint(20) UNSIGNED NOT NULL, primary key (id), unique key typestate (type_id, state_id), CONSTRAINT `to_type_relation` FOREIGN KEY (`type_id`) REFERENCES wp_cur_types (`id`) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE, CONSTRAINT `to_state_relation` FOREIGN KEY (`state_id`) REFERENCES wp_cur_states (`id`) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4

Queries made or created this session were:
